FORM.name: Q Course
FORM.COMBOLIST: class_option Main Group A Group B Group C Group D Group E Group F EAU Kamagambo Nairobi Inter Session Eldoret KenduBay Kisumu

GRID.name: Student List
GRID.where: (printed = false) AND (finalised = true) AND (student_dean_approval = true) AND (finance_approval = true) AND (chaplain_approval = true) AND (major_approval = true)
